explains: n. 有靠背的长椅；中型沙发

sentences.en: Fanny is sitting there on the settee, just as she was in the oleograph.
sentences.cn: 范妮正坐在靠背椅上，像石印油画上画的一样。

sentences.en: Why don't you lie down on the settee.
sentences.cn: 你为什么不在长椅上躺一会呢。

sentences.en: We sat primly at either end of a long settee.
sentences.cn: 我们非常拘谨地坐在长椅的两头。
